descriptionlist.description:
Speed up the iOS 9 switcher.
Features
* Hide Blurs
* Hide Icons
* Custom Backround Blur
* Custom Springboard Card Blur
* Custom App Card Alpha
* App Card Downscaling (Experimental)

changelog.change:
> Downscaling should now work for new devices.
Known issue: SB flash bug on 32-bit devices (probably). Previously though it was for iPads.
